Wu Tang Magic Kick was usually known as The MarÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s Villa until 2000 when it was re-titled to capitalise on the popularity of The Wu-Tang Clan.
  Mar Tien Liang is the master of the Magic Kick. When his home is attacked by the Fang Kang he effortlessly defeats his opponent, but his wife Mar Tien Liang is horrified to witness such violence. She implores him never to use his magic kick again, and all is well until young Fan arrives to challenge the master.
 
  **In this upload I have taken the Eastern Heroes WTMK DVD, converted it to uncompressed AVI with VirtualDub, converted it to 16:9 Anamorphic and used several random filters to clean it up.
